Processor.name: nrf51
Processor.description: nRF51 reference description for radio MCU with ARM 32-bit Cortex-M0 Microcontroller at 16MHz CPU clock

BitField.name: OFF
BitField.description: Reset from wake-up from OFF mode detected by the use of DETECT signal from GPIO.

BitField.name: LPCOMP
BitField.description: Reset from wake-up from OFF mode detected by the use of ANADETECT signal from LPCOMP.

BitField.name: DIF
BitField.description: Reset from wake-up from OFF mode detected by entering into debug interface mode.

Enum.name: Off
Enum.description: RAM block 0 is off or powering up.

Enum.name: Off
Enum.description: RAM block 1 is off or powering up.

Enum.name: Off
Enum.description: RAM block 2 is off or powering up.

Enum.name: Off
Enum.description: RAM block 3 is off or powering up.

Register.name: GPREGRET
Register.description: General purpose retention register. This register is a retained register.

BitField.name: ONRAM0
BitField.description: RAM block 0 behaviour in ON mode.

Enum.name: RAM0Off
Enum.description: RAM block 0 OFF in ON mode.

Enum.name: RAM0On
Enum.description: RAM block 0 ON in ON mode.

BitField.name: ONRAM1
BitField.description: RAM block 1 behaviour in ON mode.

Enum.name: RAM1Off
Enum.description: RAM block 1 OFF in ON mode.

Enum.name: RAM1On
Enum.description: RAM block 1 ON in ON mode.

BitField.name: OFFRAM0
BitField.description: RAM block 0 behaviour in OFF mode.

Enum.name: RAM0Off
Enum.description: RAM block 0 OFF in OFF mode.

Enum.name: RAM0On
Enum.description: RAM block 0 ON in OFF mode.

BitField.name: OFFRAM1
BitField.description: RAM block 1 behaviour in OFF mode.

Enum.name: RAM1Off
Enum.description: RAM block 1 OFF in OFF mode.

Enum.name: RAM1On
Enum.description: RAM block 1 ON in OFF mode.

Register.name: RESET
Register.description: Pin reset functionality configuration register. This register is a retained register.

BitField.name: RESET
BitField.description: Enable or disable pin reset in debug interface mode.

Enum.name: Disabled
Enum.description: Pin reset in debug interface mode disabled.

Enum.name: Enabled
Enum.description: Pin reset in debug interface mode enabled.

BitField.name: ONRAM2
BitField.description: RAM block 2 behaviour in ON mode.

Enum.name: RAM2Off
Enum.description: RAM block 2 OFF in ON mode.

Enum.name: RAM2On
Enum.description: RAM block 2 ON in ON mode.

BitField.name: ONRAM3
BitField.description: RAM block 3 behaviour in ON mode.

Enum.name: RAM3Off
Enum.description: RAM block 33 OFF in ON mode.

Enum.name: RAM3On
Enum.description: RAM block 3 ON in ON mode.

BitField.name: OFFRAM2
BitField.description: RAM block 2 behaviour in OFF mode.

Enum.name: RAM2Off
Enum.description: RAM block 2 OFF in OFF mode.

Enum.name: RAM2On
Enum.description: RAM block 2 ON in OFF mode.

BitField.name: OFFRAM3
BitField.description: RAM block 3 behaviour in OFF mode.

Enum.name: RAM3Off
Enum.description: RAM block 3 OFF in OFF mode.

Enum.name: RAM3On
Enum.description: RAM block 3 ON in OFF mode.

Register.name: TASKS_CAL
Register.description: Start calibration of LFCLK RC oscillator.

Register.name: EVENTS_DONE
Register.description: Calibration of LFCLK RC oscillator completed.

Enum.name: NotTriggered
Enum.description: Task HFCLKSTART has not been triggered.

BitField.name: SRC
BitField.description: Active clock source for the HF clock.

Enum.name: RC
Enum.description: Internal 16MHz RC oscillator running and generating the HFCLK clock.

Enum.name: Xtal
Enum.description: External 16MHz/32MHz crystal oscillator running and generating the HFCLK clock.

Enum.name: NotTriggered
Enum.description: Task LFCLKSTART has not been triggered.

BitField.name: SRC
BitField.description: Active clock source for the LF clock.

Enum.name: RC
Enum.description: Internal 32KiHz RC oscillator running and generating the LFCLK clock.

Enum.name: Xtal
Enum.description: External 32KiHz crystal oscillator running and generating the LFCLK clock.

Enum.name: Synth
Enum.description: Internal 32KiHz synthesizer from the HFCLK running and generating the LFCLK clock.

Register.name: LFCLKSRCCOPY
Register.description: Clock source for the LFCLK clock, set when task LKCLKSTART is triggered.

BitField.name: SRC
BitField.description: Clock source for the LFCLK clock, set when task LKCLKSTART is triggered.

Enum.name: Synth
Enum.description: Internal 32KiHz synthesizer from HFCLK system clock.

Register.name: LFCLKSRC
Register.description: Clock source for the LFCLK clock.

Enum.name: Synth
Enum.description: Internal 32KiHz synthesizer from HFCLK system clock.

Enum.name: 16MHz
Enum.description: 16MHz xtal is used as source for the HFCLK oscillator.

Enum.name: 32MHz
Enum.description: 32MHz xtal is used as source for the HFCLK oscillator.

Register.name: PERR0
Register.description: Configuration of peripherals in mpu regions.

Register.name: PROTENSET0
Register.description: Erase and write protection bit enable set register.

Register.name: PROTENSET1
Register.description: Erase and write protection bit enable set register.

Register.name: DISABLEINDEBUG
Register.description: Disable erase and write protection mechanism in debug mode.

BitField.name: DISABLEINDEBUG
BitField.description: Disable protection mechanism in debug mode.

Register.name: PROTBLOCKSIZE
Register.description: Erase and write protection block size.

BitField.name: PROTBLOCKSIZE
BitField.description: Erase and write protection block size.

Enum.name: 4k
Enum.description: Erase and write protection block size is 4k.

Register.name: TASKS_RSSISTART
Register.description: Start the RSSI and take one sample of the receive signal strength.

Register.name: EVENTS_DEVMATCH
Register.description: A device address match occurred on the last received packet.

Register.name: EVENTS_DEVMISS
Register.description: No device address match occurred on the last received packet.

Register.name: EVENTS_RSSIEND
Register.description: Sampling of the receive signal strength complete. A new RSSI sample is ready for readout at the RSSISAMPLE register.

Register.name: EVENTS_BCMATCH
Register.description: Bit counter reached bit count value specified in BCC register.

BitField.name: READY_START
BitField.description: Shortcut between READY event and START task.

BitField.name: END_DISABLE
BitField.description: Shortcut between END event and DISABLE task.

BitField.name: DISABLED_TXEN
BitField.description: Shortcut between DISABLED event and TXEN task.

BitField.name: DISABLED_RXEN
BitField.description: Shortcut between DISABLED event and RXEN task.

BitField.name: ADDRESS_RSSISTART
BitField.description: Shortcut between ADDRESS event and RSSISTART task.

BitField.name: END_START
BitField.description: Shortcut between END event and START task.

BitField.name: ADDRESS_BCSTART
BitField.description: Shortcut between ADDRESS event and BCSTART task.

BitField.name: DISABLED_RSSISTOP
BitField.description: Shortcut between DISABLED event and RSSISTOP task.

BitField.name: RXMATCH
BitField.description: Logical address in which previous packet was received.

BitField.name: RXCRC
BitField.description: CRC field of previously received packet.

BitField.name: DAI
BitField.description: Index (n) of device address (see DAB[n] and DAP[n]) that obtained an address match.

Register.name: PACKETPTR
Register.description: Packet pointer. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: FREQUENCY
BitField.description: Radio channel frequency offset in MHz: RF Frequency = 2400 + FREQUENCY (MHz). Decision point: TXEN or RXEN task.

BitField.name: TXPOWER
BitField.description: Radio output power. Decision point: TXEN task.

BitField.name: MODE
BitField.description: Radio data rate and modulation setting. Decision point: TXEN or RXEN task.

BitField.name: LFLEN
BitField.description: Length of length field in number of bits. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: S0LEN
BitField.description: Length of S0 field in number of bytes. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: S1LEN
BitField.description: Length of S1 field in number of bits. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: MAXLEN
BitField.description: Maximum length of packet payload in number of bytes.

BitField.name: STATLEN
BitField.description: Static length in number of bytes. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: BALEN
BitField.description: Base address length in number of bytes. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: ENDIAN
BitField.description: On air endianness of packet length field. Decision point: START task.

Enum.name: Little
Enum.description: Least significant bit on air first

Enum.name: Big
Enum.description: Most significant bit on air first

Register.name: BASE0
Register.description: Radio base address 0. Decision point: START task.

Register.name: BASE1
Register.description: Radio base address 1. Decision point: START task.

Register.name: PREFIX0
Register.description: Prefixes bytes for logical addresses 0 to 3.

BitField.name: AP0
BitField.description: Address prefix 0. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: AP1
BitField.description: Address prefix 1. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: AP2
BitField.description: Address prefix 2. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: AP3
BitField.description: Address prefix 3. Decision point: START task.

Register.name: PREFIX1
Register.description: Prefixes bytes for logical addresses 4 to 7.

BitField.name: AP4
BitField.description: Address prefix 4. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: AP5
BitField.description: Address prefix 5. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: AP6
BitField.description: Address prefix 6. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: AP7
BitField.description: Address prefix 7. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: TXADDRESS
BitField.description: Logical address to be used when transmitting a packet. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: ADDR0
BitField.description: Enable reception on logical address 0. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: ADDR1
BitField.description: Enable reception on logical address 1. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: ADDR2
BitField.description: Enable reception on logical address 2. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: ADDR3
BitField.description: Enable reception on logical address 3. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: ADDR4
BitField.description: Enable reception on logical address 4. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: ADDR5
BitField.description: Enable reception on logical address 5. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: ADDR6
BitField.description: Enable reception on logical address 6. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: ADDR7
BitField.description: Enable reception on logical address 7. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: LEN
BitField.description: CRC length. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: SKIPADDR
BitField.description: Leave packet address field out of the CRC calculation. Decision point: START task.

Enum.name: Include
Enum.description: Include packet address in CRC calculation.

Enum.name: Skip
Enum.description: Packet address is skipped in CRC calculation. The CRC calculation will start at the first byte after the address.

BitField.name: CRCPOLY
BitField.description: CRC polynomial. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: CRCINIT
BitField.description: Initial value for CRC calculation. Decision point: START task.

BitField.name: CONSTCARRIER
BitField.description: Constant carrier. Decision point: TXEN task.

BitField.name: PLLLOCK
BitField.description: PLL lock. Decision point: TXEN or RXEN task.

BitField.name: TIFS
BitField.description: Inter frame spacing in microseconds. Decision point: START rask

BitField.name: RSSISAMPLE
BitField.description: RSSI sample result. The result is read as a positive value so that ReceivedSignalStrength = -RSSISAMPLE dBm

Enum.name: Disabled
Enum.description: Radio is in the Disabled state.

Enum.name: RxRu
Enum.description: Radio is in the Rx Ramp Up state.

Enum.name: RxIdle
Enum.description: Radio is in the Rx Idle state.

Enum.name: Rx
Enum.description: Radio is in the Rx state.

Enum.name: RxDisable
Enum.description: Radio is in the Rx Disable state.

Enum.name: TxRu
Enum.description: Radio is in the Tx Ramp Up state.

Enum.name: TxIdle
Enum.description: Radio is in the Tx Idle state.

Enum.name: Tx
Enum.description: Radio is in the Tx state.

Enum.name: TxDisable
Enum.description: Radio is in the Tx Disable state.

BitField.name: DATAWHITEIV
BitField.description: Data whitening initial value. Bit 0 corresponds to Position 0 of the LSFR, Bit 1 to position 5... Decision point: TXEN or RXEN task.

BitField.name: ENA0
BitField.description: Enable or disable device address matching using device address 0.

BitField.name: ENA1
BitField.description: Enable or disable device address matching using device address 1.

BitField.name: ENA2
BitField.description: Enable or disable device address matching using device address 2.

BitField.name: ENA3
BitField.description: Enable or disable device address matching using device address 3.

BitField.name: ENA4
BitField.description: Enable or disable device address matching using device address 4.

BitField.name: ENA5
BitField.description: Enable or disable device address matching using device address 5.

BitField.name: ENA6
BitField.description: Enable or disable device address matching using device address 6.

BitField.name: ENA7
BitField.description: Enable or disable device address matching using device address 7.

BitField.name: ENABLE
BitField.description: Enable or disable override of default trim values.

BitField.name: CTS_STARTRX
BitField.description: Shortcut between CTS event and STARTRX task.

BitField.name: NCTS_STOPRX
BitField.description: Shortcut between NCTS event and STOPRX task.

Register.name: ERRORSRC
Register.description: Error source. Write error field to 1 to clear error.

BitField.name: OVERRUN
BitField.description: A start bit is received while the previous data still lies in RXD. (Data loss).

BitField.name: PARITY
BitField.description: A character with bad parity is received. Only checked if HW parity control is enabled.

BitField.name: FRAMING
BitField.description: A valid stop bit is not detected on the serial data input after all bits in a character have been received.

BitField.name: BREAK
BitField.description: The serial data input is '0' for longer than the length of a data frame.

BitField.name: ENABLE
BitField.description: Enable or disable UART and acquire IOs.

Register.name: RXD
Register.description: RXD register. On read action the buffer pointer is displaced. Once read the character is consumed. If read when no character available, the UART will stop working.

BitField.name: RXD
BitField.description: RX data from previous transfer. Double buffered.

Register.name: CONFIG
Register.description: Configuration of parity and hardware flow control register.

Register.name: EVENTS_READY
Register.description: TXD byte sent and RXD byte received.

Enum.name: MsbFirst
Enum.description: Most significant bit transmitted out first.

Enum.name: LsbFirst
Enum.description: Least significant bit transmitted out first.

Enum.name: Leading
Enum.description: Sample on leading edge of the clock. Shift serial data on trailing edge.

Enum.name: Trailing
Enum.description: Sample on trailing edge of the clock. Shift serial data on leading edge.

Register.name: EVENTS_RXDREADY
Register.description: Two-wire ready to deliver new RXD byte received.

Register.name: EVENTS_TXDSENT
Register.description: Two-wire finished sending last TXD byte.

BitField.name: BB_SUSPEND
BitField.description: Shortcut between BB event and the SUSPEND task.

BitField.name: BB_STOP
BitField.description: Shortcut between BB event and the STOP task.

Register.name: ERRORSRC
Register.description: Two-wire error source. Write error field to 1 to clear error.

BitField.name: OVERRUN
BitField.description: Byte received in RXD register before read of the last received byte (data loss).

BitField.name: ANACK
BitField.description: NACK received after sending the address.

BitField.name: DNACK
BitField.description: NACK received after sending a data byte.

Register.name: ADDRESS
Register.description: Address used in the two-wire transfer.

Register.name: EVENTS_READY
Register.description: TXD byte sent and RXD byte received.

Enum.name: MsbFirst
Enum.description: Most significant bit transmitted out first.

Enum.name: LsbFirst
Enum.description: Least significant bit transmitted out first.

Enum.name: Leading
Enum.description: Sample on leading edge of the clock. Shift serial data on trailing edge.

Enum.name: Trailing
Enum.description: Sample on trailing edge of the clock. Shift serial data on leading edge.

Register.name: EVENTS_RXDREADY
Register.description: Two-wire ready to deliver new RXD byte received.

Register.name: EVENTS_TXDSENT
Register.description: Two-wire finished sending last TXD byte.

BitField.name: BB_SUSPEND
BitField.description: Shortcut between BB event and the SUSPEND task.

BitField.name: BB_STOP
BitField.description: Shortcut between BB event and the STOP task.

Register.name: ERRORSRC
Register.description: Two-wire error source. Write error field to 1 to clear error.

BitField.name: OVERRUN
BitField.description: Byte received in RXD register before read of the last received byte (data loss).

BitField.name: ANACK
BitField.description: NACK received after sending the address.

BitField.name: DNACK
BitField.description: NACK received after sending a data byte.

Register.name: ADDRESS
Register.description: Address used in the two-wire transfer.

BitField.name: END_ACQUIRE
BitField.description: Shortcut between END event and the ACQUIRE task.

Enum.name: CPU
Enum.description: Semaphore is assigned to the CPU.

Enum.name: SPIS
Enum.description: Semaphore is assigned to the SPIS.

Enum.name: CPUPending
Enum.description: Semaphore is assigned to the SPIS, but a handover to the CPU is pending.

BitField.name: OVERREAD
BitField.description: TX buffer overread detected, and prevented.

BitField.name: OVERFLOW
BitField.description: RX buffer overflow detected, and prevented.

Register.name: MAXRX
Register.description: Maximum number of bytes in the receive buffer.

BitField.name: MAXRX
BitField.description: Maximum number of bytes in the receive buffer.

Register.name: AMOUNTRX
Register.description: Number of bytes received in last granted transaction.

BitField.name: AMOUNTRX
BitField.description: Number of bytes received in last granted transaction.

Register.name: MAXTX
Register.description: Maximum number of bytes in the transmit buffer.

BitField.name: MAXTX
BitField.description: Maximum number of bytes in the transmit buffer.

Register.name: AMOUNTTX
Register.description: Number of bytes transmitted in last granted transaction.

BitField.name: AMOUNTTX
BitField.description: Number of bytes transmitted in last granted transaction.

Enum.name: MsbFirst
Enum.description: Most significant bit transmitted out first.

Enum.name: LsbFirst
Enum.description: Least significant bit transmitted out first.

Enum.name: Leading
Enum.description: Sample on leading edge of the clock. Shift serial data on trailing edge.

Enum.name: Trailing
Enum.description: Sample on trailing edge of the clock. Shift serial data on leading edge.

BitField.name: POLARITY
BitField.description: Effects on output when in Task mode, or events on input that generates an event.

BitField.name: OUTINIT
BitField.description: Initial value of the output when the GPIOTE channel is configured as a Task.

Enum.name: Low
Enum.description: Initial low output when in task mode.

Enum.name: High
Enum.description: Initial high output when in task mode.

BitField.name: POLARITY
BitField.description: Effects on output when in Task mode, or events on input that generates an event.

BitField.name: OUTINIT
BitField.description: Initial value of the output when the GPIOTE channel is configured as a Task.

Enum.name: Low
Enum.description: Initial low output when in task mode.

Enum.name: High
Enum.description: Initial high output when in task mode.

BitField.name: POLARITY
BitField.description: Effects on output when in Task mode, or events on input that generates an event.

BitField.name: OUTINIT
BitField.description: Initial value of the output when the GPIOTE channel is configured as a Task.

Enum.name: Low
Enum.description: Initial low output when in task mode.

Enum.name: High
Enum.description: Initial high output when in task mode.

BitField.name: POLARITY
BitField.description: Effects on output when in Task mode, or events on input that generates an event.

BitField.name: OUTINIT
BitField.description: Initial value of the output when the GPIOTE channel is configured as a Task.

Enum.name: Low
Enum.description: Initial low output when in task mode.

Enum.name: High
Enum.description: Initial high output when in task mode.

Enum.name: Ready
Enum.description: No ongoing ADC conversion is taking place. ADC is ready.

Enum.name: Busy
Enum.description: An ADC conversion is taking place. ADC is busy.

Enum.name: Enabled
Enum.description: ADC is enabled. If an analog input pin is selected as source of the conversion, the selected pin is configured as an analog input.

Enum.name: AnalogInputNoPrescaling
Enum.description: Analog input specified by PSEL with no prescaling used as input for the conversion.

Enum.name: AnalogInputTwoThirdsPrescaling
Enum.description: Analog input specified by PSEL with 2/3 prescaling used as input for the conversion.

Enum.name: AnalogInputOneThirdPrescaling
Enum.description: Analog input specified by PSEL with 1/3 prescaling used as input for the conversion.

Enum.name: SupplyTwoThirdsPrescaling
Enum.description: Supply voltage with 2/3 prescaling used as input for the conversion.

Enum.name: SupplyOneThirdPrescaling
Enum.description: Supply voltage with 1/3 prescaling used as input for the conversion.

Enum.name: VBG
Enum.description: Use internal 1.2V bandgap voltage as reference for conversion.

Enum.name: External
Enum.description: Use external source configured by EXTREFSEL as reference for conversion.

Enum.name: SupplyOneHalfPrescaling
Enum.description: Use supply voltage with 1/2 prescaling as reference for conversion. Only usable when supply voltage is between 1.7V and 2.6V.

Enum.name: SupplyOneThirdPrescaling
Enum.description: Use supply voltage with 1/3 prescaling as reference for conversion. Only usable when supply voltage is between 2.5V and 3.6V.

Enum.name: AnalogInput0
Enum.description: Use analog input 0 as analog input.

Enum.name: AnalogInput1
Enum.description: Use analog input 1 as analog input.

Enum.name: AnalogInput2
Enum.description: Use analog input 2 as analog input.

Enum.name: AnalogInput3
Enum.description: Use analog input 3 as analog input.

Enum.name: AnalogInput4
Enum.description: Use analog input 4 as analog input.

Enum.name: AnalogInput5
Enum.description: Use analog input 5 as analog input.

Enum.name: AnalogInput6
Enum.description: Use analog input 6 as analog input.

Enum.name: AnalogInput7
Enum.description: Use analog input 7 as analog input.

Register.name: TASKS_CAPTURE[0]
Register.description: Capture Timer value to CC[n] registers.

Register.name: TASKS_CAPTURE[1]
Register.description: Capture Timer value to CC[n] registers.

Register.name: TASKS_CAPTURE[2]
Register.description: Capture Timer value to CC[n] registers.

Register.name: TASKS_CAPTURE[3]
Register.description: Capture Timer value to CC[n] registers.

BitField.name: COMPARE0_CLEAR
BitField.description: Shortcut between CC[0] event and the CLEAR task.

BitField.name: COMPARE1_CLEAR
BitField.description: Shortcut between CC[1] event and the CLEAR task.

BitField.name: COMPARE2_CLEAR
BitField.description: Shortcut between CC[2] event and the CLEAR task.

BitField.name: COMPARE3_CLEAR
BitField.description: Shortcut between CC[3] event and the CLEAR task.

BitField.name: COMPARE0_STOP
BitField.description: Shortcut between CC[0] event and the STOP task.

BitField.name: COMPARE1_STOP
BitField.description: Shortcut between CC[1] event and the STOP task.

BitField.name: COMPARE2_STOP
BitField.description: Shortcut between CC[2] event and the STOP task.

BitField.name: COMPARE3_STOP
BitField.description: Shortcut between CC[3] event and the STOP task.

BitField.name: BITMODE
BitField.description: Sets timer behaviour ro be like the implementation of a timer with width as indicated.

Register.name: PRESCALER
Register.description: 4-bit prescaler to source clock frequency (max value 9). Source clock frequency is divided by 2^SCALE.

BitField.name: PRESCALER
BitField.description: Timer PRESCALER value. Max value is 9.

Register.name: TASKS_CAPTURE[0]
Register.description: Capture Timer value to CC[n] registers.

Register.description: Capture Timer value to CC[n] registers.

BitField.name: COMPARE0_CLEAR
BitField.description: Shortcut between CC[0] event and the CLEAR task.

BitField.name: COMPARE1_CLEAR
BitField.description: Shortcut between CC[1] event and the CLEAR task.

BitField.name: COMPARE3_CLEAR

BitField.name: COMPARE0_STOP

BitField.name: BITMODE
BitField.description: Sets timer behaviour ro be like the implementation of a timer with width as indicated.

Register.name: PRESCALER
Register.description: 4-bit prescaler to source clock frequency (max value 9). Source clock frequency is divided by 2^SCALE.

BitField.description: Timer PRESCALER value. Max value is 9.

Register.name: EVTEN
Register.description: Configures event enable routing to PPI for each RTC event.

Register.name: EVTENSET
Register.description: Enable events routing to PPI. The reading of this register gives the value of EVTEN.

BitField.name: TICK
BitField.description: Enable routing to PPI of TICK event.

BitField.name: OVRFLW
BitField.description: Enable routing to PPI of OVRFLW event.

BitField.name: COMPARE0
BitField.description: Enable routing to PPI of COMPARE[0] event.

BitField.name: COMPARE1
BitField.description: Enable routing to PPI of COMPARE[1] event.

BitField.name: COMPARE2
BitField.description: Enable routing to PPI of COMPARE[2] event.

BitField.name: COMPARE3
BitField.description: Enable routing to PPI of COMPARE[3] event.

Register.name: EVTENCLR
Register.description: Disable events routing to PPI. The reading of this register gives the value of EVTEN.

BitField.name: TICK
BitField.description: Disable routing to PPI of TICK event.

BitField.name: OVRFLW
BitField.description: Disable routing to PPI of OVRFLW event.

BitField.name: COMPARE0
BitField.description: Disable routing to PPI of COMPARE[0] event.

BitField.name: COMPARE1
BitField.description: Disable routing to PPI of COMPARE[1] event.

BitField.name: COMPARE2
BitField.description: Disable routing to PPI of COMPARE[2] event.

BitField.name: COMPARE3
BitField.description: Disable routing to PPI of COMPARE[3] event.

Register.name: PRESCALER
Register.description: 12-bit prescaler for COUNTER frequency (32768/(PRESCALER+1)). Must be written when RTC is STOPed.

Register.name: EVENTS_DATARDY
Register.description: Temperature measurement complete, data ready event.

Register.name: TEMP
Register.description: Die temperature in degC, 2's complement format, 0.25 degC pecision.

Register.name: EVENTS_VALRDY
Register.description: New random number generated and written to VALUE register.

BitField.name: VALRDY_STOP
BitField.description: Shortcut between VALRDY event and STOP task.

Register.name: TASKS_STARTECB
Register.description: Start ECB block encrypt. If a crypto operation is running, this will not initiate a new encryption and the ERRORECB event will be triggered.

Register.name: TASKS_STOPECB
Register.description: Stop current ECB encryption. If a crypto operation is running, this will will trigger the ERRORECB event.

Register.name: EVENTS_ERRORECB
Register.description: ECB block encrypt aborted due to a STOPECB task or due to an error.

Register.name: TASKS_START
Register.description: Start resolving addresses based on IRKs specified in the IRK data structure.

BitField.name: STATUS
BitField.description: The IRK used last time an address was resolved.

Register.name: NIRK
Register.description: Number of Identity root Keys in the IRK data structure.

BitField.name: NIRK
BitField.description: Number of Identity root Keys in the IRK data structure.

Register.name: IRKPTR
Register.description: Pointer to the IRK data structure.

Register.name: ADDRPTR
Register.description: Pointer to the resolvable address (6 bytes).

Register.name: SCRATCHPTR
Register.description: Pointer to a scratch data area used for temporary storage during resolution. A minimum of 3 bytes must be reserved.

Register.name: TASKS_KSGEN
Register.description: Start generation of key-stream. This operation will stop by itself when completed.

Register.name: TASKS_CRYPT
Register.description: Start encrypt/decrypt. This operation will stop by itself when completed.

BitField.name: ENDKSGEN_CRYPT
BitField.description: Shortcut between ENDKSGEN event and CRYPT task.

BitField.name: MICSTATUS
BitField.description: Result of the MIC check performed during the previous CCM RX STARTCRYPT

Register.name: CNFPTR
Register.description: Pointer to a data structure holding AES key and NONCE vector.

Register.name: SCRATCHPTR
Register.description: Pointer to a scratch data area used for temporary storage during resolution. A minimum of 43 bytes must be reserved.

Enum.name: DisabledOrRequested
Enum.description: RR[0] register is not enabled or has already requested reload.

Enum.name: EnabledAndUnrequested
Enum.description: RR[0] register is enabled and has not jet requested.

Enum.name: DisabledOrRequested
Enum.description: RR[1] register is not enabled or has already requested reload.

Enum.name: EnabledAndUnrequested
Enum.description: RR[1] register is enabled and has not jet requested.

Enum.name: DisabledOrRequested
Enum.description: RR[2] register is not enabled or has already requested reload.

Enum.name: EnabledAndUnrequested
Enum.description: RR[2] register is enabled and has not jet requested.

Enum.name: DisabledOrRequested
Enum.description: RR[3] register is not enabled or has already requested reload.

Enum.name: EnabledAndUnrequested
Enum.description: RR[3] register is enabled and has not jet requested.

Enum.name: DisabledOrRequested
Enum.description: RR[4] register is not enabled or has already requested reload.

Enum.name: EnabledAndUnrequested
Enum.description: RR[4] register is enabled and has not jet requested.

Enum.name: DisabledOrRequested
Enum.description: RR[5] register is not enabled or has already requested reload.

Enum.name: EnabledAndUnrequested
Enum.description: RR[5] register is enabled and has not jet requested.

Enum.name: DisabledOrRequested
Enum.description: RR[6] register is not enabled or has already requested reload.

Enum.name: EnabledAndUnrequested
Enum.description: RR[6] register is enabled and has not jet requested.

Enum.name: DisabledOrRequested
Enum.description: RR[7] register is not enabled or has already requested reload.

Enum.name: EnabledAndUnrequested
Enum.description: RR[7] register is enabled and has not jet requested.

Register.name: CRV
Register.description: Counter reload value in number of 32kiHz clock cycles.

BitField.name: SLEEP
BitField.description: Configure the watchdog to pause or not while the CPU is sleeping.

Enum.name: Pause
Enum.description: Pause watchdog while the CPU is asleep.

Enum.name: Run
Enum.description: Do not pause watchdog while the CPU is asleep.

BitField.name: HALT
BitField.description: Configure the watchdog to pause or not while the CPU is halted by the debugger.

Enum.name: Pause
Enum.description: Pause watchdog while the CPU is halted by the debugger.

Enum.name: Run
Enum.description: Do not pause watchdog while the CPU is halted by the debugger.

Enum.name: Reload
Enum.description: Value to request a reload of the watchdog timer.

Enum.name: Reload
Enum.description: Value to request a reload of the watchdog timer.

Enum.name: Reload
Enum.description: Value to request a reload of the watchdog timer.

Enum.name: Reload
Enum.description: Value to request a reload of the watchdog timer.

Enum.name: Reload
Enum.description: Value to request a reload of the watchdog timer.

Enum.name: Reload
Enum.description: Value to request a reload of the watchdog timer.

Enum.name: Reload
Enum.description: Value to request a reload of the watchdog timer.

Enum.name: Reload
Enum.description: Value to request a reload of the watchdog timer.

Register.name: EVTEN
Register.description: Configures event enable routing to PPI for each RTC event.

Register.name: EVTENSET
Register.description: Enable events routing to PPI. The reading of this register gives the value of EVTEN.

BitField.name: TICK
BitField.description: Enable routing to PPI of TICK event.

BitField.name: OVRFLW
BitField.description: Enable routing to PPI of OVRFLW event.

BitField.name: COMPARE0
BitField.description: Enable routing to PPI of COMPARE[0] event.

BitField.name: COMPARE1
BitField.description: Enable routing to PPI of COMPARE[1] event.

BitField.name: COMPARE2
BitField.description: Enable routing to PPI of COMPARE[2] event.

BitField.name: COMPARE3
BitField.description: Enable routing to PPI of COMPARE[3] event.

Register.name: EVTENCLR
Register.description: Disable events routing to PPI. The reading of this register gives the value of EVTEN.

BitField.name: TICK
BitField.description: Disable routing to PPI of TICK event.

BitField.name: OVRFLW
BitField.description: Disable routing to PPI of OVRFLW event.

BitField.name: COMPARE0
BitField.description: Disable routing to PPI of COMPARE[0] event.

BitField.name: COMPARE1
BitField.description: Disable routing to PPI of COMPARE[1] event.

BitField.name: COMPARE2
BitField.description: Disable routing to PPI of COMPARE[2] event.

BitField.name: COMPARE3
BitField.description: Disable routing to PPI of COMPARE[3] event.

Register.name: PRESCALER
Register.description: 12-bit prescaler for COUNTER frequency (32768/(PRESCALER+1)). Must be written when RTC is STOPed.

Register.name: TASKS_READCLRACC
Register.description: Transfers the content from ACC registers to ACCREAD registers, and clears the ACC registers.

Register.name: EVENTS_SAMPLERDY
Register.description: A new sample is written to the sample register.

Register.name: EVENTS_REPORTRDY
Register.description: REPORTPER number of samples accumulated in ACC register, and ACC register different than zero.

BitField.name: REPORTRDY_READCLRACC
BitField.description: Shortcut between REPORTRDY event and READCLRACC task.

BitField.name: SAMPLERDY_STOP
BitField.description: Shortcut between SAMPLERDY event and STOP task.

BitField.name: SAMPLE
BitField.description: Last sample taken in compliment to 2.

Register.name: REPORTPER
Register.description: Number of samples to generate an EVENT_REPORTRDY.

BitField.name: REPORTPER
BitField.description: Number of samples to generate an EVENT_REPORTRDY.

Register.name: ACCREAD
Register.description: Snapshot of ACC register. Value generated by the TASKS_READCLEACC task.

Register.name: PSELA
Register.description: Pin select for phase A input.

Register.name: PSELB
Register.description: Pin select for phase B input.

Register.name: LEDPRE
Register.description: Time LED is switched ON before the sample.

BitField.name: LEDPRE
BitField.description: Period in us the LED in switched on prior to sampling.

Register.name: ACCDBLREAD
Register.description: Snapshot of ACCDBL register. Value generated by the TASKS_READCLEACC task.

Register.name: EVENTS_READY
Register.description: LPCOMP is ready and output is valid.

Register.name: EVENTS_DOWN
Register.description: Input voltage crossed the threshold going down.

Register.name: EVENTS_UP
Register.description: Input voltage crossed the threshold going up.

Register.name: EVENTS_CROSS
Register.description: Input voltage crossed the threshold in any direction.

BitField.name: READY_SAMPLE
BitField.description: Shortcut between READY event and SAMPLE task.

BitField.name: READY_STOP
BitField.description: Shortcut between RADY event and STOP task.

BitField.name: DOWN_STOP
BitField.description: Shortcut between DOWN event and STOP task.

BitField.name: UP_STOP
BitField.description: Shortcut between UP event and STOP task.

BitField.name: CROSS_STOP
BitField.description: Shortcut between CROSS event and STOP task.

BitField.name: RESULT
BitField.description: Result of last compare. Decision point SAMPLE task.

Enum.name: Below
Enum.description: Input voltage is bellow the reference threshold.

Enum.name: Above
Enum.description: Input voltage is above the reference threshold.

Enum.name: AnalogInput0
Enum.description: Use analog input 0 as analog input.

Enum.name: AnalogInput1
Enum.description: Use analog input 1 as analog input.

Enum.name: AnalogInput2
Enum.description: Use analog input 2 as analog input.

Enum.name: AnalogInput3
Enum.description: Use analog input 3 as analog input.

Enum.name: AnalogInput4
Enum.description: Use analog input 4 as analog input.

Enum.name: AnalogInput5
Enum.description: Use analog input 5 as analog input.

Enum.name: AnalogInput6
Enum.description: Use analog input 6 as analog input.

Enum.name: AnalogInput7
Enum.description: Use analog input 7 as analog input.

Enum.name: SupplyOneEighthPrescaling
Enum.description: Use supply with a 1/8 prescaler as reference.

Enum.name: SupplyTwoEighthsPrescaling
Enum.description: Use supply with a 2/8 prescaler as reference.

Enum.name: SupplyThreeEighthsPrescaling
Enum.description: Use supply with a 3/8 prescaler as reference.

Enum.name: SupplyFourEighthsPrescaling
Enum.description: Use supply with a 4/8 prescaler as reference.

Enum.name: SupplyFiveEighthsPrescaling
Enum.description: Use supply with a 5/8 prescaler as reference.

Enum.name: SupplySixEighthsPrescaling
Enum.description: Use supply with a 6/8 prescaler as reference.

Enum.name: SupplySevenEighthsPrescaling
Enum.description: Use supply with a 7/8 prescaler as reference.

Enum.name: ARef
Enum.description: Use external analog reference as reference.

Enum.name: Cross
Enum.description: Generate ANADETEC on crossing, both upwards and downwards crossing.

Enum.name: Up
Enum.description: Generate ANADETEC on upwards crossing only.

Enum.name: Down
Enum.description: Generate ANADETEC on downwards crossing only.

Enum.name: Busy
Enum.description: NVMC is busy (on-going write or erase operation).

Register.name: ERASEPAGE
Register.description: Register for erasing a non-protected non-volatile memory page.

Register.name: ERASEPCR1
Register.description: Register for erasing a non-protected non-volatile memory page.

Register.name: ERASEALL
Register.description: Register for erasing all non-volatile user memory.

BitField.name: ERASEALL
BitField.description: Starts the erasing of all user NVM (code region 0/1 and UICR registers).

Register.name: ERASEPCR0
Register.description: Register for erasing a protected non-volatile memory page.

Register.name: ERASEUICR
Register.description: Register for start erasing User Information Congfiguration Registers.

BitField.name: ERASEUICR
BitField.description: It can only be used when all contents of code region 1 are erased.

Register.name: CODEPAGESIZE
Register.description: Code memory page size in bytes.

Register.name: CLENR0
Register.description: Length of code region 0 in bytes.

Register.name: NUMRAMBLOCK
Register.description: Number of individualy controllable RAM blocks.

Register.name: SIZERAMBLOCKS
Register.description: Size of RAM blocks in bytes.

Register.name: SIZERAMBLOCK[0]
Register.description: Deprecated array of size of RAM block in bytes. This name is kept for backward compatinility purposes. Use SIZERAMBLOCKS instead.

Register.name: SIZERAMBLOCK[1]
Register.description: Deprecated array of size of RAM block in bytes. This name is kept for backward compatinility purposes. Use SIZERAMBLOCKS instead.

Register.name: SIZERAMBLOCK[2]
Register.description: Deprecated array of size of RAM block in bytes. This name is kept for backward compatinility purposes. Use SIZERAMBLOCKS instead.

Register.name: SIZERAMBLOCK[3]
Register.description: Deprecated array of size of RAM block in bytes. This name is kept for backward compatinility purposes. Use SIZERAMBLOCKS instead.

BitField.name: FWID
BitField.description: Firmware Identification Number pre-loaded into the flash.

BitField.name: NRF_1MBIT
BitField.description: Override default values for NRF_1Mbit mode.

Enum.name: Override
Enum.description: Override the default values for NRF_1Mbit mode.

Enum.name: NotOverride
Enum.description: Do not override the default values for NRF_1Mbit mode.

BitField.name: BLE_1MBIT
BitField.description: Override default values for BLE_1Mbit mode.

Enum.name: Override
Enum.description: Override the default values for BLE_1Mbit mode.

Enum.name: NotOverride
Enum.description: Do not override the default values for BLE_1Mbit mode.

Register.name: NRF_1MBIT[0]
Register.description: Override values for the OVERRIDEn registers in RADIO for NRF_1Mbit mode.

Register.name: NRF_1MBIT[1]
Register.description: Override values for the OVERRIDEn registers in RADIO for NRF_1Mbit mode.

Register.name: NRF_1MBIT[2]
Register.description: Override values for the OVERRIDEn registers in RADIO for NRF_1Mbit mode.

Register.name: NRF_1MBIT[3]
Register.description: Override values for the OVERRIDEn registers in RADIO for NRF_1Mbit mode.

Register.name: NRF_1MBIT[4]
Register.description: Override values for the OVERRIDEn registers in RADIO for NRF_1Mbit mode.

Register.name: BLE_1MBIT[0]
Register.description: Override values for the OVERRIDEn registers in RADIO for BLE_1Mbit mode.

Register.name: BLE_1MBIT[1]
Register.description: Override values for the OVERRIDEn registers in RADIO for BLE_1Mbit mode.

Register.name: BLE_1MBIT[2]
Register.description: Override values for the OVERRIDEn registers in RADIO for BLE_1Mbit mode.

Register.name: BLE_1MBIT[3]
Register.description: Override values for the OVERRIDEn registers in RADIO for BLE_1Mbit mode.

Register.name: BLE_1MBIT[4]
Register.description: Override values for the OVERRIDEn registers in RADIO for BLE_1Mbit mode.

BitField.name: PR0
BitField.description: Readback protect region 0. Will be ignored if pre-programmed factory code is present on the chip.

BitField.name: PALL
BitField.description: Readback protect all code in the device.

Register.name: XTALFREQ
Register.description: Reset value for CLOCK XTALFREQ register.

BitField.name: XTALFREQ
BitField.description: Reset value for CLOCK XTALFREQ register.

BitField.name: FWID
BitField.description: Identification number for the firmware loaded into the chip.

Register.name: OUTSET
Register.description: Set individual bits in GPIO port.

Register.name: OUTCLR
Register.description: Clear individual bits in GPIO port.

BitField.name: RELOAD
BitField.description: Value to load into the SYST_CVR when the counter is enabled and when it reaches 0

BitField.name: CURRENT
BitField.description: The current value of the SysTick counter

BitField.name: NOREF
BitField.description: Indicates whether the device provides a reference clock to the processor

BitField.name: SKEW
BitField.description: Indicates whether the TENMS value is exact

BitField.name: TENMS
BitField.description: Reload value for 10ms (100Hz) timing, subject to system clock skew errors

BitField.name: VECTPENDING
BitField.description: Indicates the exception number of the highest priority pending enabled exception

Register.name: AIRCR
Register.description: Application Interrupt and Reset Control Register

BitField.name: SLEEPDEEP
BitField.description: Controls whether the processor uses sleep or deep sleep as its low power mode

BitField.name: SLEEPONEXIT
BitField.description: Indicates sleep-on-exit when returning from Handler mode to Thread mode

BitField.name: STKALIGN
BitField.description: Indicates stack alignment on exception entry

Register.name: SHCSR
Register.description: System Handler Control and State Register

BitField.name: ADDRESSS
BitField.description: The location of the unpopulated floating-point register space allocated on an exception stack frame

BitField.name: DZC
BitField.description: Division by Zero cumulative exception bit
